title: Weekly Review With Clay and Buck H1 - Sep 3 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review With Clay and Buck H1 - Sep 3 2022
description:
The Mar-a-Largo raid is a distraction from the failed policies of the Democrats. Buck says, "Democrat voters and the whole Trump circus. They don't want to deal with it right now. He's not on the ballot, which is true. So, why are we all getting involved in this?" What are Republicans standing for as we roll toward the midterms? Joe "The Uniter" Biden calls 50% of the country, "Semifacists." Why did Trump keep those documents? Rep. Jim Jordan of Ohio: Democrats "haven’t done one thing right" while controlling Congress. California will ban the sale of gasoline-powered cars in the state by 2035, a bold climate goal that will close businesses, cut jobs, hurt consumers financially, and increase strain on the power grid. New York Gov. Kathy Hochul tells Republicans to "jump on a bus and head down to Florida where you belong... you are not New Yorkers." Clay sums it up: "This election is about keeping left-wing Democrats from running roughshod over American values. And we've gotta win, and we've gotta win big."

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
